channel.title: Clojure on Engineering @ Logic Soft
channel.description: Recent content in Clojure on Engineering @ Logic Soft

item.title: Dynamic prepared statements in Clojure
item.description: So just recently, at Logic Soft, we put our first (small) clojure project into production. It was a small library management system that was custom developed for one of our existing clients. At Logic Soft, we are majorly a .NET house but we’re beginning to experiment with different platforms and technologies and felt that this was a small enough project to give clojure a shot (alongside other experiments we conducted with it).
